nodes.text: Mirgo Ruus was a Mandalorian, who lived during the time of the Galactic Republic's transformation into the Galactic Empire. Ruus made a living crafting Mandalorian flight suits, and over time, developed a reputation for quality work.
In the year 19 BBY, the veteran Mandalorian soldier Kal Skirata considered approaching Ruus to tailor a flight suit for his young grandson, Venku Skirata.
Mirgo Ruus was first introduced to the Star Wars universe in the novel Order 66, the fourth entry in author Karen Traviss' Republic Commando series, published September 16, 2008.
